title: Container port
creator_credit: Ian Woolfe, James Ritchie, Edgar H. Anstey, IC Productions and British Transport Films
brief_description: The story of the development of Tilbury into Britain’s biggest and newest container port, built and equipped to tranship standard maritime containers which are the key to a world-wide revolution in freight handling. Commentary by John Stockbridge.
creator_credit_for_label: Ian Woolfe, James Ritchie, Edgar H. Anstey, IC Productions and British Transport Films
